properties.name: From Summer 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothPalace Embankment, St Petersburg, RussiaSt. Petersburg was the first place my parents and I visited on our trip this summer.

properties.name: My Home
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothSan Diego, CAI live in SD County.

properties.name: Summer 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothThis is near where we stayed with our friends. This entire area has family significance for my dad\'s side. We visited my great great grandfather\'s house, which has since been remodeled, but the feeling is still there.

properties.name: Summer 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothWe stayed three places in Switzerland: Oberburg, Pochtenalp and Oechenensee. We have friends in Oberburg who we stayed with for several days. Then we went to Pochtenalp. Getting there is scary because it is near the top of the steepest road in Europe -a 28% grade! Kandersteg is in a valley below Oechenensee, a glacial lake in the mountains.

properties.name: Summer 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothStockholm, SwedenThe Silja Line landed in Stockholm where we then took the train the rest of the way to Norway.

properties.name: Summer 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothMy dad and I stayed in Naples with an ex-student of his and her husband. We hiked Mt. Vesuvious and visited Pompeii. We also went to Pozzuoli. Being in Naples makes you build confidence because if you walk around without it, you will get eaten up.

properties.name: Summer 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothOslo, NorwayMy parents and I went to Oslo to visit family on my mom\'s side. (After St. Petersburg)

properties.name: Summer 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothhelsinkiLeaving Russia, we took a train to Helsinki, spent a few hours there and then left by a cruise liner called the Silja Line.

properties.name: Summer 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothWe stayed in Flam, a beautiful place on the inside of part of the longest fjord in Norway, for a night. We took a boat along the fjord and then a bus up to Voss (where the water comes from) and then back to Oslo.

properties.name: Summer 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothWe stayed with relatives in a tiny town called Schoorl which is right on the North Sea. It\'s close to Alkmaar. I like Alkmaar because it\'s not too big and still has some good food and shopping. They hold a cheese market there that is fun to watch, but a little too touristy for me.

properties.name: Tour 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothmadridWe saw genuine Flamenco dancing here. It was incredible!

properties.name: Tour 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothBeautiful.

properties.name: Tour 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothOur tour group landed in Lisboa. I had an awesome time doing street photography here.

properties.name: Tour 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothPossibly one of my favorite places in the world.

properties.name: Tour 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothToledo, SpainMy favorite place in Spain. Okay, my favorite place on the trip.

properties.name: Tour 06
properties.description: Posted by AmschaffrothWalked around at night and gave a short concert in the freezing wind.
